items.sentence: I told Tom he shouldn\'t go out after dark by himself.
Tom needed someone he could discuss his problems with.
I hope that we can avoid these mistakes in the future.
I wasn\'t the one who sang at Tom and Mary\'s wedding.
Tom can be a bit of a stickler when it comes to rules.
Do you have anyone on your staff who can speak French?
Do you really think Tom can convince Mary to help him?
Do you remember the first time we spoke to each other?
According to this map, there used to be a church here.
I\'m sure Tom will lend you as much money as you need.
I\'ve tried calling Tom all day, but the line is busy.
Would you tell Tom why you don\'t want him to do that?
Tom and I used to play together when we were children.
Tom asked Mary to go to Boston with John next weekend.
Tom wanted me to tell you he needs to borrow your car.
